Row.Text: We are pleased to accept your offer of friendship.
On behalf of the people of Kongo, I accept your friendship and good will.
I accept your offer of friendship. And of course, you'll be invited to the next royal wedding.
Дуже добре. Ви посіли гідне місце поряд мене.
A strong ally is the greatest friend. Let us live in peace.
I accept your offer of friendship. May it be blessed with peace.
Гільгамеш з радістю прийме вашу дружбу. Нехай світ знає, що ми заприсягнулися дружити!
You have proven to be a good friend of Sparta. I will accept on behalf of my people.
Friends? Yes, I am a friend.
I see in you the peace and tranquility of a warrior, and I welcome that friendship.
We are pleased to accept your offer of friendship.
On behalf of the Democracy, I accept your friendship.
Мнє нравіца твайо прідлаженіє. Ктоже аткажеца ат новай пріслугі.
You are blessed by God, and a friend to me. Let the world know you are protected by His might.
You have proven yourself a worthy friend to the Middle Kingdom, we accept your offer.
I understand now that you are a friend to my nation. Let us declare our friendship to the world.
I can't say no to that.
Дружба навік або смерть за її зраду.
Let it be known that your Empire is a friend to ours, and that we are joined together in friendship.
Yes, this pleases us. Our two nations will surely benefit from our friendship.
We are not interested at this time.
Kongo is not ready to accept your friendship. Let our relationship ripen first.
I apologize, but this would be too sudden a change. Perhaps another time?
Оу! Поряд мене цезарі та фараони. Що вас змусило думати, що ви гідні бути поряд мене?
No, I cannot accept your friendship, for the good of the Empire.
I am sorry, but I cannot enter into this agreement with you. Please understand, it is only for the best.
Gilgamesh is no friend to you.
Sparta does not need your friendship.
No, not for all the treasure in Asgard.
I must decline, in the best interests of the Shogunate and on behalf of the Emperor.
We are not interested at this time.
No, we will not be friends until you can prove it by deed, or convince us otherwise.
Баюсь должен атказать. Мнє нєнравіца нєрастаропная пріслуга.
No, I do not accept your offer. You are a sinner, and no friend of Spain.
You are not yet worthy of our friendship.
Your offer is a generous and kind one, but we must humbly decline until we can be assured of your intentions.
We are not interested at this time.
Мою дружбу легко не отримати. Спершу, ви маєте заслужити мою довіру.
Rome must remain Rome: a friend to no one more than to herself.
Надто скоро для таких зобов'язань. Ми зробимо це за відповідних умов. Якщо ви мене розумієте?
Would you like to formally declare our friendship?
I extend my hand in friendship to you. Let our people be brothers and sisters under the Lord.
I extend to you the royal hand in friendship. Will you accept it?
Правителі вбивають один одного за можливість стати моїм другом. Моя дружба - цінність, котру я вам пропоную. Якою буде ваша відповідь?
Again we extend our hand, but this time in friendship. Will you accept it?
I suppose leadership at one time meant violence; but today it means getting along with people. So… will you accept my friendship?
All of the world knows of my generosity to my friends. Let us then be friends, not enemies.
I hereby offer you Sparta’s friendship, will you accept?
In all my travels I have never met someone as great as I am until I met you. Let us be friends, then.
You are harmonious and wise. We offer you loyalty and honor, if you would accept us as your friend.
Would you like to formally declare our friendship?
Let’s put our differences aside for a moment, shall we? Friendship is more important than petty politics.
Атнинє тєбє і тваіму наротцу випала чєсть стать младшим братам маіму - вєлікаму і магучєму народу. Твой нарот гатов служ... дружить?
I believe you have seen the wisdom in the light of the Lord. Let us share in friendship his blessing.
Please, allow us to return your friendship with ours.
You have proven yourself a wise and just leader. Would you accept my offer of friendship?
You have earned my respect. Shall we declare our friendship?
Friendship is the most valuable thing between nations. Let us have it.
Glorious Rome extends an offer of friendship. Do you accept?
We are pleased to consider you an esteemed friend. We hope the feeling is mutual…
Wonderful.
Велике вам дякую.
Дякую.
Буду вельми вдячна.
Вельми вдячний.
Щиро дякую вам.
Дякую вам!
Я вдячна.
Дякую за це.
Thank you, friend.
Чудово.
Thank you.
Я іскрєнна благадарєн.
Боже благослови вас.
Прийміть мою вдячність.
Благослови вас Аллах.
Дякую за це.
Щиро дякую.
Дяки.
Ви найдобріші й найуважніші з усіх кого я знаю.
That is unfortunate.
That is unfortunate.
How unfortunate!
That is such a shame.
Perhaps next time, then.
An unfortunate turn.
Are you mad?
Unfortunate.
A shame...
A shame…
That is unfortunate.
That’s unfortunate.
Глупа, очєнь глупа...
That is unfortunate.
Bad luck.
Mind what you say.
That is too bad.
You should reconsider.
What a shame.
How unfortunate.
Перепрошую, але наразі ми не можемо цього собі дозволити.
Ми з радістю повідомимо світу про нашу дружбу.
Котіться зі своєю дружбою кудись подалі!
